queryParameters.description: Territory Abbreviated Name for US and Canada (eg: NY for New York). Full Territory Name for all other countries

queryParameters.description: A D&B code value that describes the defined structure in which the product is to be rendered, e.g., txt, xml, pdf.

queryParameters.name: IndustryCode-1
queryParameters.description: An alphanumeric value identifying a business activity based on the scheme specified by the typeText. For instance, 1611 represents the highway and street construction industry in the U.S. SIC (Standard Industrial Classification) system. Clarification Note: These are generally external codes created by an external authoritative body, like the U.S. Office of Management and Budget (OMB), but D&B may have created extensions to more precisely define an activity, as in the case of the SIC 2+2 (the last 4 digits of an 8-digit SIC).

queryParameters.name: IndustryCodeTypeCode-1
queryParameters.description: Attribute Possible values: 19295 [UK SIC 2007]; 3599 [D&B Standard Industry Code]; 700 [NAICS]

queryParameters.name: ReturnOnlyPremiumIndustryIndicator
queryParameters.description: When true (set to 1), only the industries part of First Research Industry List have to be listed in the search response. When false (set to 0) all the industries that match the search criteria have to be listed in the search response.

pathParameters.name: state_territory
pathParameters.description: Code represented in ISO 3166-2 scheme defining the name of a principal subdivision (e.g., province or state) of a country coded in ISO 3166-1; e.g., US-NJ represents the state New Jersey in United States, CA-ON represents the province Ontario in Canada. The first part is the ISO 3166-1 alpha-2 code of the country; The second part is a string of up to three alphanumeric characters, which is usually obtained from national sources and stems from coding systems already in use in the country concerned, but may also be developed by the ISO itself.

pathParameters.name: productID
pathParameters.description: An alphanumeric string that uniquely identifies the product being requested.

queryParameters.name: Application Transaction ID
queryParameters.description: A number assigned by the calling application to uniquely identify this request.

queryParameters.name: Transaction Timestamp
queryParameters.description: The date and time when this request was created. When the request is from an intermediary, such as a workflow manager or service bus, this is the date and time when the message was sent to the D&B function, i.e., the date and time when the xml document was created by the requesting intermediary.

queryParameters.name: Submitting Office ID
queryParameters.description: A number that identifies the system or the software application from where this request originated. / A number used to uniquely identfy the D&B business segment or delivery channel from where this request originated.

queryParameters.name: Language Preference Code
queryParameters.description: A D&B code value that defines the language in which the customer wants this product to be rendered.

queryParameters.name: Extend Archive Period Indicator
queryParameters.description: When 'true' the duration to archive the data is to be extended. Note: There is an additional cost for extending the archival period of the data purchased. When 'false' the duration to archive the data is not to be extended.

queryParameters.name: CustomerReferenceText-1
queryParameters.description: A freeform reference string provided by the customer to be linked to the product in order to support subsequent order reconciliation.

queryParameters.name: Customer Billing Endorsement Text
queryParameters.description: Text that is filled in by customer and commonly contains requesting individual or department name, or customer's own account/reference number and/or name for the case on which the product was provided.This text is a reference used during the billing process.

queryParameters.name: IndsCdTypCd
queryParameters.description: Possible values: 1015 [US Standard Industry Code 1972 - 4 digit]; 1016 [US Standard Industry Code 1972 - 4 digit (European version)]; 12901 [Norwegian NACE]; 1716 [Norwegian Activity Code - D&B NACE]; 1743 [SW NACE Code]; 18052 [Sweden Classification of Economic Activities in the EC, Rev. 2]; 18053 [Denmark Classification of Economic Activities in the EC , Rev. 2]; 19295 [UK Standard Industry Code 2007]; 19307 [Belgium NACE 2008]; 19556 [Netherlands SBI 2008]; 20056 [Norwegian NACE Revision 2]; 20078 [Nomenclature of French Activities Revision 2 (NAF Rev. 2)]; 20107 [Finnish NACE Revision 2]; 2086 [NAF Code: Nomenclature d'Activité Française]; 2831 [1977 Canada 8 digits]; 3599 [Standard Industry Code - 8 digit]; 3609 [NACE Revision 1]; 3843 [BL NACE]; 3844 [BL VAT NACE]; 3845 [BL Social Security NACE - 4 digit]; 3846 [BL Euro DB NACE]; 3847 [BL Registered Contractor Code]; 399 [US Standard Industry Code 1987 - 4 digit]; 490 [DK Nace: DB93 +]; 570 [FIN NACE]; 6082 [NL CBS Industry Code 5 digit - 1993]; 6083 [NL KvK Industry Code (BIK) 6 digit - 1995]; 6967 [WZ 93]; 700 [North American Industry Classification System]; 8101 [BL Joint Committee Classification].

queryParameters.name: Application Transaction ID
queryParameters.description: An alphanumeric string that uniquely identifies the transaction being requested.

queryParameters.name: Transaction Time stamp
queryParameters.description: dateTime

queryParameters.name: PrfdLangCd
queryParameters.description: integer up to 7 digits.

queryParameters.name: PrfdWritScrpCd
queryParameters.description: integer up to 7 digits.

pathParameters.description: An alphanumeric value identifying a business activity based on the scheme specified by the typeText. Clarification Note: These are generally external codes created by an external authoritative body, like the U.S. Office of Management and Budget (OMB), but D&B may have created extensions to more precisely define an activity, as in the case of the SIC 2+2 (the last 4 digits of an 8-digit SIC).

pathParameters.name: code_type
pathParameters.description: Possible values: 25838 [D&B Hoovers Industry Code]

queryParameters.name: InclusionDataDescription
queryParameters.description: Text that denotes an inclusion requirement that the Search process should apply to allow subjects from being returned as candidates. queryParameters.name: CandidateDisplayStartSequenceNumber
queryParameters.description: Records the Display sequence number of the results

queryParameters.name: MonitoringProfileStatusText
queryParameters.description: Records the status of the monitoring profile.Possible values: Active; Cancelled

queryParameters.name: ServiceVersionNumber
queryParameters.description: A number that identifies the version of the Service for the product being monitored. If the Service Version is not provided in the request, the response will contain results for all the available versions.

queryParameters.name: DNBProductID
queryParameters.description: Records the product code that is provided by the customer to create a profile

queryParameters.name: SortDirectionText
queryParameters.description: Records the direction of sorting. Possbile values are Ascending, Descending

queryParameters.name: ApplicationAreaName
queryParameters.description: Records the ApplicationAreaName of the results

queryParameters.name: CreatedToDate
queryParameters.description: Records the enddate of the date range to list the user preference

queryParameters.name: SortBasisText
queryParameters.description: Records the list of fields based on which sorting is possible

queryParameters.name: CreatedFromDate
queryParameters.description: Records the start date of the date range to list the user preference

queryParameters.name: DeliveryFormat
queryParameters.description: Possible values: XML, JSON

queryParameters.name: DeliveryMode
queryParameters.description: Possible values: Email; HTTPCallBack; MQOutput

queryParameters.name: amCandidatePerPageMaximumQuantity
queryParameters.description: Records the maximum quantity that can be displayed per page

queryParameters.name: DeliveryChannelUserPreferenceName
queryParameters.description: Records the DeliveryChannelUserPreferenceName of the results

queryParameters.name: ServiceVersionNumber
queryParameters.description: A number that identifies the version of the Service.

queryParameters.name: ApplicationTransactionID
queryParameters.description: A number assigned by the calling application to uniquely identify this request.

queryParameters.name: DNBProductID
queryParameters.description: Records the product code that is provided by the customer to create a profile

queryParameters.name: MonitoringLevel
queryParameters.description: A alphanumeric string which determines the level of details that the customer will receive during a change event.Possible values: Level1; Level2

queryParameters.name: SortBasisText
queryParameters.description: Records the list of fields based on which sorting is possible.Possible values: DUNSNumber; CountryISOAlpha2Code; MonitoringProfileID; DNBProductID; MonitoringLevel; NotificationProfileID; RegistrationStartDate; SubjectCategoryText; AutoRenewalIndicator; MonitoringRegistartionStatusText

queryParameters.name: SortDirectionText
queryParameters.description: Records the direction of sorting. Possbile values are Ascending, Descending

queryParameters.name: CandidatePerPageMaximumQuantity
queryParameters.description: Records the maximum quantity that can be displayed per page

queryParameters.name: CandidateDisplayStartSequenceNumber
queryParameters.description: Records the Display sequence number of the results

pathParameters.name: productID
pathParameters.description: Records the product code that is provided by the customer to create a profile

queryParameters.name: ServiceVersionNumber
queryParameters.description: A number that identifies the version of the Service.

queryParameters.name: TransactionTimestamp
queryParameters.description: The date and time when this request was created. When the request is from an intermediary, such as a workflow manager or service bus, this is the date and time when the message was sent to the D&B function, i.e., the date and time when the xml document was created by the requesting intermediary.

queryParameters.name: ApplicationTransactionID
queryParameters.description: A number assigned by the calling application to uniquely identify this request.

queryParameters.name: ServiceVersionNumber

queryParameters.name: DUNSNumber
queryParameters.description: Records the duns number that is registered for Monitoring.

queryParameters.name: MonitoringProfileID-1
queryParameters.description: A number that uniquely identifies a set of events and their thresholds, used to monitor a DUNS or a set of DUNS.

queryParameters.name: MonitoringLevel
queryParameters.description: A alphanumeric string which determines the level of details that the customer will receive during a change event.Possible values: Level1; Level2

queryParameters.name: GetCountOnlyIndicator
queryParameters.description: When true (set to 1) this indicates that the count related to the resultset is to be returned in the response. When false (set to 0) this indicates that the details pertaining to result is to be returned in the response.

queryParameters.description: Records the maximum quantity that can be displayed per page

queryParameters.name: OwnershipPercentage
queryParameters.description: The percentage criteria to be applied on the requested product for the inquired subject. The response would include all results with a shareholding percentage greater than this value inclusive. E.g., 20, 50. When NULL it indicates that there is no restriction or cut off percentage.

queryParameters.name: OwnershipType
queryParameters.description: A code that identifies the level of filter to applied on the requested product for the inquired subject, whether to include direct, indirect, both direct and indirect owners, or just beneficial owners etc. When NULL it indicates that there are no restrictions set on the request.

pathParameters.name: D-U-N-S Number
pathParameters.description: The D-U-N-S Number is D&B's identification number, which provides unique identification of this organization, in accordance with the Data Universal Numbering System (D-U-N-S).

pathParameters.name: productID
pathParameters.description: An alphanumeric string that uniquely identifies the product being requested.

queryParameters.name: ApplicationTransactionID
queryParameters.description: Unique Transaction ID of the request generated by the service

queryParameters.name: CustomerReferenceText-1
queryParameters.description: A freeform reference string provided by the customer to be linked to the product in order to support subsequent order reconciliation.

queryParameters.name: CustomerBillingEndorsementText
queryParameters.description: A D&B code value that describes the defined structure in which the product is to be rendered, e.g., txt, xml, pdf.

queryParameters.name: CountryISOAlpha2Code
queryParameters.description: The two-letter country code, defined in the ISO 3166-1 scheme published by International Organization for Standardization (ISO), identifying the country for this address.

queryParameters.name: CustomerReferenceText-2
queryParameters.description: A freeform reference string provided by the customer to be linked to the product in order to support subsequent order reconciliation.

queryParameters.name: CustomerReferenceText-3
queryParameters.description: A freeform reference string provided by the customer to be linked to the product in order to support subsequent order reconciliation.

queryParameters.name: streetaddressline
queryParameters.description: Text that records the street address components as it would be presented on an address label. This includes, but is not limited to, details such as street name, street number, building name, estate name.

queryParameters.name: PrimaryTownName
queryParameters.description: The name of the town or city recognized by the Postal Authority for delivering mail.

queryParameters.name: TerritoryName
queryParameters.description: Territory Abbreviated Name for US and Canada (e.g.: NY for New York). Full Territory Name for all other countries. The name of a locally governed area which forms part of a centrally governed nation. As a guiding principle this is a geographic area which could theoretically exist as a separate nation. In the U.S. this would be a State in the UK this would be one of the Home Nations.

queryParameters.name: PostalCode
queryParameters.description: An identifier used by the local country Postal Authority to identify a particular geographic location. For example, in Belgium, Postal Code 9000 identifies the town of GHENT.
